      • setHelp

        ICommandEngine setHelp(java.lang.String help)
        Set which command is related to user help. The command will be recommended if the user fails to use a command.
        Parameters:
        help - command name
        Returns:
        A reference to this object.
        See Also:
        HelpCommand

      • getHelpCommand

        ICommand getHelpCommand()
        Return the ICommand object of the help command.
        Returns:
        Help Command object.

      • isReactToMention

        boolean isReactToMention()
        Get whether the bot should react to mention or not.
        Returns:
        True if the bot should react to mention calls.

      • setReactToMention

        ICommandEngine setReactToMention(boolean reactToMention)
        Sets if the bot should react to a message starting by mentioning the bot @bot_name if sets to false, the bot will only react to prefix.
        Parameters:
        reactToMention - True if the bot should react to mention calls.
        Returns:
        A reference to this object.
        See Also:
        getPrefix(MessageReceivedEvent)

      • loadCommands

        void loadCommands()
        Registers ICommands from packages set into the engine. It also registers into JDA any ICommand object that also implements Slash.

      • isReactToMention

        boolean isReactToMention(net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.Event event)
        Checks if bot should react to mention calls (Messages that starts with @BOT_NAME).
        Parameters:
        event - Discord event that triggered this function call.
        Returns:
        true if the bot should react to mention, false if only reacts to prefix.

      • getCommand

        ICommand getCommand(java.lang.String name)
        Get an ICommand from the registered commands in the Engine.
        Parameters:
        name - command's name.
        Returns:
        ICommand instance.
        See Also:
        ICommand

      • getCommandsByPartialMatch

        java.util.List<ICommand> getCommandsByPartialMatch(java.lang.String name)
        Get a list of ICommand from the registered commands in the Engine.
        Parameters:
        name - partial command's name.
        Returns:
        List of ICommand that match the partial search.

      • getCommandsByExactMatch

        java.util.List<ICommand> getCommandsByExactMatch(java.lang.String name)
        Get a list of ICommand from the registered commands in the Engine.
        Parameters:
        name - expected command's name.
        Returns:
        List of ICommand that match the search.

      • getCommands

        java.util.List<ICommand> getCommands()
        Get a list of ICommand registered in the Engine.
        Returns:
        list of ICommand instances loaded in the Engine.

      • addCommand

        ICommandEngine addCommand(ICommand command)
                   throws DuplicatedNameException,
                          javax.naming.InvalidNameException
        Registers an ICommand into the engine.
        Parameters:
        command - The command to be registered.
        Returns:
        A reference to this object.
        Throws:
        DuplicatedNameException - Error if there's another command with the same name or alias registered.
        javax.naming.InvalidNameException - Error if the command doesn't match the expected name.

      • addAlias

        ICommandEngine addAlias(java.lang.String name,
                        ICommand command)
                 throws DuplicatedNameException,
                        javax.naming.InvalidNameException
        Add an alternative name to a command.
        Parameters:
        name - alternative name.
        command - Command to be called.
        Returns:
        A reference to this object.
        Throws:
        DuplicatedNameException - Thrown when there's already a commando with the same name/alias.
        javax.naming.InvalidNameException - Thrown when the command's alias uses non-alphanumeric characters.

      • getPrefix

        java.lang.String getPrefix(net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.message.MessageReceivedEvent event)
        By default, it gets the prefix configured on the bot. May be used to get a prefix based on the guild.
        Parameters:
        event - Message Received event that triggered this request.
        Returns:
        prefix string.

      • getPrefix

        java.lang.String getPrefix(net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.interaction.command.SlashCommandInteractionEvent event)
        By default, it gets the prefix configured on the bot. May be used to get a prefix based on the guild.
        Parameters:
        event - Slash command that triggered this request.
        Returns:
        prefix string.

      • getPrefix

        java.lang.String getPrefix(net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.Event event)
        By default, it gets the prefix configured on the bot. May be used to get a prefix based on the guild.
        Parameters:
        event - Event that triggered this request.
        Returns:
        prefix string.

      • getLanguage

        java.util.Locale getLanguage(net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.Event event)
        By default, gets the default language to be used by the bot. May be used to get a Locale based on the Guild information.
        Parameters:
        event - Discord event that triggered this function call.
        Returns:
        current language.
        See Also:
        MultiLocaleResourceBundle.getSupportedLocale()
